The Space is our Inspiration

Extremophiles our superheroes
They are extremely incredible!
1
Resist high doses of radiation

Radiation is extremely lethal for humans, however, there are some microorganisms and animals that can receive high doses of radiation, for example, the bacteria "Deinococcus radiodurans"; although we know that this factor is one of the main ones that affect many living beings, not only in space but on earth itself.

2
Can endure for years

Few organisms can live for many years, some of the extremophiles can be in an "inactivated" state when conditions are extreme, due to multiple factors such as their metabolism. Such is the case of tardigrades, they can be in a dry state and become active again in optimal conditions

3
Can repair their DNA

DNA repair is an enigma, this could help us make great advances in medicine. Although, there are those that repair their DNA after undergoing stress factors, such as radiation; somo examples are D. radioduran and Tardigrades. Currently there is research for the transfer of genes from tardigrades to humans, incredible isn't it?

About the B.R.E.A.C game
VR immersion in space

We offer you the opportunity to explore space in a unique way, would you dare to face the most extreme and stressful conditions of the universe? Will you be able to meet all the superheroes and survive?

B.R.E.A.C. is a video game that seeks to simulate the conditions that could occur in space and on planets similar to Earth so that a person like you can experience the immersive feeling of being in space and face dangerous situations, which is why to survive you will have the opportunity to find your favorite superhero to help you accomplish your journey through the vast space.

Choose wisely which superhero to choose to inhabit the planets. Will you manage to find a planet suitable for you?

Have fun exploring the space and observe in detail the planets, one day thanks to our superheroes we will be able to inhabit another planet...
